titleInfo.title: Immense glacier basin beneath the Fiescherhorn, looking through Grindelwald Gorge, Switzerland

mods.abstract: Glacier at the foot of the Fiescherhorn with a building in the foreground.

Fiescherhorn is a name for a group of three mountains in the Bernese Oberland: Gross Fiescherhorn (4049m), Hinter Fiescherhorn (4025 m) and Kleines Fiescherhorn (3900 m). The mountain is well hidden behind other mountains and can only be seen from the town of Grindelwald.
